Description: Four famous siblings throw an epic party to celebrate the end of summer. But over the course of 24 hours, their lives will change forever.

Title: The Last Thing He Told Me
Author: Laura Dave
Description: Hannah Hall discovers truths about her missing husband and bonds with his daughter from a previous relationship.

Title: One Last Stop
Author: Casey McQuiston
Description: August meets the girl of her dreams on a New York subway only to find she’s from another time.

Title: How The Word Is Passed
Author: Clint Smith
Description: A staff writer at The Atlantic explores the legacy of slavery and its imprint on centuries of American history.

Title: Killing The Mob
Author: Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
Description: The 10th book in the conservative commentator’s Killing series looks at organized crime in the United States during the 20th century.

Title: After The Fall
Author: Ben Rhodes
Description: A former White House aide and close confidant to President Barack Obama traveled the globe to discover just how much America’s fingerprints are on the world we shaped.

Title: The Premonition
Author: Michael Lewis
Description: Stories of skeptics who went against the official response of the Trump administration to the outbreak of Covid-19. The profiles include a local public-health officer and a group of doctors nicknamed the Wolverines.

Title: What Happened To You?
Author: Bruce D. Perry and Oprah Winfrey
Description: An approach to dealing with trauma that shifts an essential question used to investigate it.

Title: Golden Girl
Author: Elin Hilderbrand
Description: A Nantucket novelist gets one final summer to watch what happens from the great beyond.

Author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
Description: Four famous siblings throw an epic party to celebrate the end of summer. But over the course of 24 hours, their lives will change forever.

Title: The Last Thing He Told Me
Author: Laura Dave
Description: Hannah Hall discovers truths about her missing husband and bonds with his daughter from a previous relationship.

Title: Sooley
Author: John Grisham
Description: Samuel Sooleymon receives a basketball scholarship to North Carolina Central and determines to bring his family over from a civil war-ravaged South Sudan.

Title: Legacy
Author: Nora Roberts
Description: Threats put in rhymes and sent from shifting locations escalate as the daughter of a successful fitness celebrity’s own yoga business grows.

Title: How The Word Is Passed
Author: Clint Smith
Description: A staff writer at The Atlantic explores the legacy of slavery and its imprint on centuries of American history.

Author: Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
Description: The 10th book in the conservative commentator’s Killing series looks at organized crime in the United States during the 20th century.

Author: Michael Lewis
Description: Stories of skeptics who went against the official response of the Trump administration to the outbreak of Covid-19. The profiles include a local public-health officer and a group of doctors nicknamed the Wolverines.

Title: Freed
Author: E.L. James
Description: The final chapter of the Fifty Shades as Told by Christian trilogy delves into the wedding between Christian Grey and Anastasia Steele.

Title: One Last Stop
Author: Casey McQuiston
Description: August meets the girl of her dreams on a New York subway only to find she’s from another time.

Title: Where The Crawdads Sing
Author: Delia Owens
Description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.

Title: People We Meet On Vacation
Author: Emily Henry
Description: Opposites Poppy and Alex meet to vacation together one more time in hopes of saving their relationship.

Title: The Song Of Achilles
Author: Madeline Miller
Description: A reimagining of Homer’s “Iliad” that is narrated by Achilles' companion Patroclus.

Title: The Body Keeps The Score
Author: Bessel van der Kolk
Description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery.

Title: Braiding Sweetgrass
Author: Robin Wall Kimmerer
Description: A botanist and member of the Citizen Potawatomi Nation espouses having an understanding and appreciation of plants and animals.

Title: Born A Crime
Author: Trevor Noah
Description: A memoir about growing up biracial in apartheid South Africa by the host of “The Daily Show.”

Title: Killers Of The Flower Moon
Author: David Grann
Description: The story of a murder spree in 1920s Oklahoma that targeted Osage Indians, whose lands contained oil. The fledgling F.B.I. intervened, ineffectively.

Title: Sapiens
Author: Yuval Noah Harari
Description: How Homo sapiens became Earth’s dominant species.

Title: The Boy, The Mole, The Fox And The Horse
Author: Charlie Mackesy

Title: The Women Of The Bible Speak
Author: Shannon Bream

Title: Stamped (For Kids)
Author: Jason Reynolds, Ibram X. Kendi and Sonja Cherry-Paul
Description: An adaptation of "Stamped" for younger readers.

Title: The Game Master: Summer Schooled
Author: Matt and Rebecca Zamolo
Description: Rebecca Zamolo takes on the Game Master, who threatens to ruin summer.

Title: Refugee
Author: Alan Gratz
Description: Three children in three different conflicts look for safe haven.

Title: Wonder
Author: R.J. Palacio
Description: A boy with a facial deformity starts school.

Title: The Ickabog
Author: J.K. Rowling
Description: A fearsome monster threatens the kingdom of Cornucopia.

Title: Strange Planet: The Sneaking, Hiding, Vibrating Creature
Author: Nathan W. Pyle
Description: Lifegiver and Offspring study the behavior of a feline.

Title: I Love Dad With The Very Hungry Caterpillar
Author: Eric Carle
Description: Celebrating dad with help from that insatiable insect.

Title: I Wish You More
Author: Amy Krouse Rosenthal. Illustrated by Tom Lichtenheld
Description: A bounty of good wishes.

Title: Why A Daughter Needs A Dad
Author: Gregory E. Lang. Illustrated by Sydney Hanson

Title: The Wonderful Things You Will Be
Author: Emily Winfield Martin

Title: Shadow And Bone Trilogy
Author: Leigh Bardugo
Description: The basis of the Netflix series; previously titled "The Grisha Trilogy."

Title: Diary Of A Wimpy Kid
Author: Jeff Kinney
Description: The travails and challenges of adolescence.

Title: Harry Potter
Author: J.K. Rowling

Title: Awesome Friendly Kid
Author: Jeff Kinney
Description: Rowley Jefferson chronicles his life story and adventures.

Title: Wings Of Fire
Author: Tui T. Sutherland

Title: Instructions For Dancing
Author: Nicola Yoon

Title: One Of Us Is Lying
Author: Karen M. McManus
Description: For five students, a detour into detention ends in murder.

Title: Realm Breaker
Author: Victoria Aveyard
Description: A small band of misfits attempt to save Allward.

Title: Stamped
Author: Jason Reynolds and Ibram X. Kendi
Description: An exploration of racism and antiracism in America.

Title: Rule Of Wolves
Author: Leigh Bardugo
Description: The second book in the King of Scars duology.
